roleset.name: become slender

roles.note: Arg0 was added later, so intransitive instances will all have been tagged with arg1 in the past.

example.name: they all look like this
example.text: Kenneth Mayland, economist for Society Corp., a Cleveland bank, said [demand for exports of factory goods]-1 is beginning *trace*-1 to taper off.

roleset.note: Updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4.

example.name: except the ones that look like this.
example.text: Some of his teen-age patients drank as much as four quarts of milk a day, Dr. Fisher found, and their acne tapered off as soon as he tapered off their milk.
example.arg: as soon as he tapered off their milk

predicate.note: Frames file for 'taper' based on sentences in wsj.
